name: Starving Specter
description: The Starving Specter is an ethereal being with a dismal presence, capable of flying silently through the air. It embodies the lost souls of the departed, shifting faces of its former victims often appear on its visage.
memorable: Its ability to invoke fear and psychic pain makes it a terrifying foe.
goals: It seeks to inflict suffering and terror on the living, preying on their fears.
relations: Often related to other undead creatures, it could be encountered alongside wraiths or other specters.
environment: Typically found in abandoned places, graveyards, or haunted ruins.
strengths: Possesses good Constitution and Wisdom saving throws, and can manipulate the battlefield with its fear-inducing abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to psychic damage, making it an easier target for certain spells.
attacks: Can perform Multiattack, utilizing a Bite attack that inflicts piercing and necrotic damage, and a Bladed Arm attack that deals slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Unnerving Visage frightens foes and deals psychic damage, making them vulnerable to its attacks.
senses: Possesses Ethereal Sight, allowing it to see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane.
skills: Has a perception skill of +2, giving it the ability to notice hidden creatures moderately well.
additional_information: Aura of the Forgotten grants disadvantage on saving throws.
Incorporeal Movement allows passing through objects fantastically.
Life Hunger enhances damage against recovering creatures.
Undead Nature means it doesn't require food or sleep.
The specter can shift its appearance to resemble loved ones or foes.
test_queries: creature with ethereal movement and fear tactics
specter that frightens and consumes life
undead that shifts into foes' relatives
menacing flying creature attacking with necrotic damage
